clean_data: Sr JavaPLSQL Developer Sr span lJavaspanPLSQL span lDeveloperspan Sr JavaPLSQL Developer SEI Investments Innovative Senior Java Developer with around 8 years of IT experience of in all the phases of Software Development Life Cycle SDLC which includes translation of requirements into functional and technical specifications Designing Developing Testing Implementation Post Production support using development methodologies like Waterfall AgileScrum TDD in BankingFinance domain Hands on experience in JAVA JEE JSP Servlets REST Web Services Hibernate Spring Struts JavaScript and AJAX technologies in design coding performance tuning testing maintenance and support of software applications Expertise in developing and implementing Web applications using JavaJ2EE Technologies including XML Networking Threads IO Servlets JNDI JDBC Struts JMS EJB 302x Java Beans Spring Hibernate and SOAPREST web services Experienced in designing the Front end pages using scripting languages like HTML DHTML CSS Java script JQuery JSF AJAX Extensive experience of Java J2EE Design Patterns like MVC Singleton Session Facade Factory Producer Consumer DAO DTO Business Delegate Factory Abstract Factory Service Locator In depth knowledge on core java concepts such as OOPS Collections Threading generics Exception handling MultiThreading Execution services concurrent utilities File IO Garbage Collection and Serialization Possess good experience in designing and developing SOA based interface and web services SOAP WSDL UDDI using Apache Axis2 and RESTful web services in java with JAXRS reference implementation Jersey Good Knowledge and experience working with applications developed using Object Relational Mapping frameworks like Hibernate and MVC frameworks like Struts and Spring and its subsidiary modules such as Spring MVC Spring and Spring AOP Experience implementing Enterprise Java Bean EJB technology as a middle layer for communication with database servers Good experience of writing SQL Queries PLSQL JPA that includes Procedures functions triggers cursors and packages Experience with ORM mapping tools like Hibernate which implements Java Persistence API JPA Experience in working with application servers like Web Logic and Apache Tomcat Hands on experience in configuring and using Ant build tools Expert in using version control tools such as such as Tortoise SVN GIT and Bit Bucket Experienced in writing and implementing unit test cases using Junit and Mockito Strong experience on various development environments IDE Tools like Eclipse Netbeans PLSQL Developer Good experience in unit testing Integration testing and User Acceptance testing using JUNIT Experience in writing developer test cases preparing Scope traceability Matrix Experience in using Check styles Find Bugs to write code efficiently that ease maintenance and reduces code reviews and executing test coverage using EMMA tool and regression testing tool like Fitness Work Experience Sr JavaPLSQL Developer SEI Investments Oaks PA July 2010 to Present Project Client Portfolio Management SEI is redefining Wealth Management SEI investment infrastructure platforms solutions and services can help clients remain relevant and help them achieve lasting success SEI is serving various sections of industry ranging from Asset Managers Banks Wealth Management Firms Financial Advisors and Institutional Investors etc Client Portfolio Management is a division which manages to build web applications that are part of this whole system like orders bulk orders releasing orders to street compound orders strategy associations for portfolios investment classifications cash drift overdraft applications to mention a few Responsibilities Achieving the functionality and design through java programming language Developed the GUIs using HTML CSS JSP Java script jQuery framework Components Used Restful web services to consume the data from different projects Used JPA named queries concept to retrieve data from the database and integrate with Spring MVC to interact with back end persistence system Oracle Request and Response mapping using Spring AOP from and to the application server by annotation based spring configuration in Eclipse IDE Utilized core J2EE design patterns such as DTO Data Transfer Object DAO in the implementation of the services Maintain highquality of RESTful services and general services implemented REST web Services using Spring MVC Spring Boot Struts spanning across various applications Worked with XML to exchanges messages through JMS among servers to retrieve information about customer details Involved in development of cloud based services using spring boot pivotal cloud foundry Used MOCKITO to develop test cases for java bean components and test them through TestNG framework And used Code coverage plugins like SonarQube to improve the coverage and quality of code Developed various test cases to test the functionality for E2E EndtoEnd flow of application like fitness Developing SQL stored procedure and prepared statements for updating and accessing data from database Used ANT to build and deploy application onto Weblogic Application Server Also worked in Production support analyzed issues and fixed by writing SQL scripts and java code Used RALLY tracking tool to manage and track the issues reported by QA and prioritize and take Action based on the severity Involved in training team members with the application and business functionality Used GIT Bit Bucket for maintaining the component and for release and version management Environment Java17 Spring 323 Hibernate 3040 JPA HTML5 CSS3 RESTFUL Web Services XML JSP JMS Eclipse Neon Mockito JUnit Windows JSON Oracle 9i10g11g12i Weblogic 812c Rally Git Bit bucket SONAR Education Bachelor of Science in Applied Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering West Bengal University of Technology Kolkata West Bengal 2009 Skills ECLIPSE EJB JAVA HIBERNATE SPRING JAX JAXB JAXP JAXWS JMS JNDI jQuery JSP JSTL SERVLETS STRUTS API DESIGN PATTERNS Git JAVASCRIPT PLSQL PL SQL PLSQL
